      void acceptTerms(boolean accepts, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.AcceptTermsResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)
      Accept the latest terms and conditions and privacy policy for the current user.
      void checkSupport(androidx.core.util.Consumer<pro.streem.sdk.Streem.FeatureSupportResult> resultCallback, pro.streem.sdk.Streem.Feature... feature)
      Checks if the requested features are supported on this device. Calls resultCallback asynchronously with the result.
      void createInvitation(java.lang.String toUserName, java.lang.String referenceId, java.lang.String phone, Streem.InvitationType invitationType, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.CreateInvitationResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)
      Creates an invitation to streem, and returns invitation information for display to the user.
      static Streem get()
      Returns the shared class Streem instance. Streem.initialize MUST have been called before calling this method.
      void getCompanySettings(java.lang.String companyCode, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.CompanySettingsResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)
      Gets the settings for a specified company.
      java.lang.String getExitCode(int requestCode, int resultCode, android.content.Intent data)
      Returns the exit code from the Streem experience if requestCode represents an Activity that was started by the Streem SDK. Otherwise returns null. This method should be called from Activity.onActivityResult or Fragment.onActivityResult. It should only be called when resultCode == RESULT_OK in order to avoid calling Streem.get() before the Streem SDK has been initialized.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMissingPermissions(android.content.Context context)
      Returns a list of the permissions required to use the Streem SDK that are not presently granted.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRequiredPermissions()
      Returns a list of the permissions required to use the Streem SDK.
      void getSupportedCountries(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.SupportedCountriesResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)
      Returns a list of countries supported by the Streem service. Typically this is used before calling createInvitation when submitting a phone param, which must include a country code. First call getSupportedCountries, then use the countries list to populate a form field for country code, and/or validate user-entered phone numbers before submitting them phone number to createInvitation.
      static Streem initialize(Streem.Configuration configuration)
      Initializes the Streem SDK. Should be called in the Application's onCreate method.
      void login(Streem.UserProfile userProfile, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.LoginCompletionResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)
      Logs in the current user to the Streem SDK. New users are automatically provisioned on first use. Existing users will have their profile information updated to match userProfile.
      void login(java.lang.String invitationCode, boolean isExpert, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.LoginInvitationResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)
      Logs in the user invited via the invitation code and passes back invitation details (the inviter's name, company, avatar image URL, etc.) through resultCallback. This can be used to show the invited user a lobby or waiting room screen with info about the person that invited them, before actually starting a streem. Call startStreemActivity to start the streem after displaying the lobby or waiting room, passing in the class Streem.StreemInvitation received in resultCallback.
      void logout()
      Logs out the user that was last logged in via login. This should be used whenever the user logs out from the app.
      void openTutorial(android.app.Activity currentActivity, java.util.List<kotlin.Array[]> tutorials, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.Throwable,kotlin.Unit> errorCallback)
      Opens the provided AR tutorials in a new full-screen Activity. The first tutorial in the list will be the starting tutorial.
      void openTutorial(android.app.Activity currentActivity, kotlin.Array[] tutorial, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.Throwable,kotlin.Unit> errorCallback)
      Opens the provided AR tutorials in a new full-screen Activity. The first tutorial in the list will be the starting tutorial.

      Opens the AR tutorials from the provided raw resourceIds in a new full-screen Activity. The first tutorial in the list will be the starting tutorial.

      void showInvitationDialog(Streem.StreemInvitation streemInvitation, android.app.Activity currentActivity, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.InvitationDialogResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)
      Presents a lobby/waiting room dialog with details of the inviting user and company, and a button to proceed with joining the inviting user in a Streem call. When the user presses the button, it opens or joins a room with the invitation in a new full-screen Activity.

      Presents a lobby/waiting room dialog with details of the inviting user and company, and a button to proceed with joining the inviting user in a Streem call. When the user presses the button, it opens or joins a room with the invitation in a new full-screen Activity.

      • checkSupport

        public void checkSupport(@NotNull
                         androidx.core.util.Consumer<pro.streem.sdk.Streem.FeatureSupportResult> resultCallback,
                         @NotNull
                         pro.streem.sdk.Streem.Feature... feature)

        Checks if the requested features are supported on this device. Calls resultCallback asynchronously with the result.

        The callback will be called on the Android main thread.

        Parameters:
        resultCallback - the callback called with the class Streem.FeatureSupportResult
        feature - a list of features to check for support
        See Also:
        feature, resultCallback

      • login

        public void login(@NotNull
                  Streem.UserProfile userProfile,
                  @Nullable
                  kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.LoginCompletionResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)

        Logs in the current user to the Streem SDK. New users are automatically provisioned on first use. Existing users will have their profile information updated to match userProfile.

        Parameters:
        userProfile - the user profile to log in
        resultCallback - a function that is called with the class Streem.LoginCompletionResult
        See Also:
        userProfile

      • login

        public void login(@NotNull
                  java.lang.String invitationCode,
                  boolean isExpert,
                  @NotNull
                  kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.LoginInvitationResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)

        Logs in the user invited via the invitation code and passes back invitation details (the inviter's name, company, avatar image URL, etc.) through resultCallback. This can be used to show the invited user a lobby or waiting room screen with info about the person that invited them, before actually starting a streem. Call startStreemActivity to start the streem after displaying the lobby or waiting room, passing in the class Streem.StreemInvitation received in resultCallback.

        See also showInvitationDialog, which instead uses a default lobby dialog provided by the Streem SDK.

        Parameters:
        invitationCode - the invitation code of the invited user's invitation.
        isExpert - whether the invited user is an expert.
        resultCallback - a function that is called with a class Streem.LoginInvitationResult
        See Also:
        resultCallback, startStreemActivity, class Streem.StreemInvitation, resultCallback, showInvitationDialog

      • showInvitationDialog

        @MainThread
public void showInvitationDialog(@NotNull
                                             Streem.StreemInvitation streemInvitation,
                                             @NotNull
                                             android.app.Activity currentActivity,
                                             @Nullable
                                             kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.InvitationDialogResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)

        Presents a lobby/waiting room dialog with details of the inviting user and company, and a button to proceed with joining the inviting user in a Streem call. When the user presses the button, it opens or joins a room with the invitation in a new full-screen Activity.

        This is similar to calling startStreemActivity. However, showInvitationDialog uses a built-in dialog and handles user interaction with the dialog to accept or reject the invitation.

        Parameters:
        streemInvitation - the invited user's invitation.
        currentActivity - this Activity's onActivityResult method will be called with theroom's exit code.
        resultCallback - an optional function that may be called multiple times withclass Streem.InvitationDialogResults generated while showing the dialog and starting the Streem call.
        See Also:
        startStreemActivity, showInvitationDialog

      • showInvitationDialog

        @MainThread
public void showInvitationDialog(@NotNull
                                             Streem.StreemInvitation streemInvitation,
                                             @NotNull
                                             androidx.fragment.app.Fragment currentFragment,
                                             @Nullable
                                             kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.InvitationDialogResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)

        Presents a lobby/waiting room dialog with details of the inviting user and company, and a button to proceed with joining the inviting user in a Streem call. When the user presses the button, it opens or joins a room with the invitation in a new full-screen Activity.

        This is similar to calling startStreemActivity. However, showInvitationDialog uses a built-in dialog and handles user interaction with the dialog to accept or reject the invitation.

        Parameters:
        streemInvitation - the invited user's invitation.
        currentFragment - this Fragment's onActivityResult method will be called with theroom's exit code.
        resultCallback - an optional function that may be called multiple times withclass Streem.InvitationDialogResults generated while showing the dialog and starting the Streem call.
        See Also:
        startStreemActivity, showInvitationDialog

      • getExitCode

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String getExitCode(int requestCode,
                                              int resultCode,
                                              @Nullable
                                              android.content.Intent data)

        Returns the exit code from the Streem experience if requestCode represents an Activity that was started by the Streem SDK. Otherwise returns null. This method should be called from Activity.onActivityResult or Fragment.onActivityResult. It should only be called when resultCode == RESULT_OK in order to avoid calling Streem.get() before the Streem SDK has been initialized.

        For a tutorial, this will be the exit code specified in the tutorial's step destination. This can also be EXIT_CODE_HELP or EXIT_CODE_EXIT if the user exited via one of the toolbar buttons.

        See Also:
        requestCode, Activity.onActivityResult, resultCode

      • logout

        public void logout()

        Logs out the user that was last logged in via login. This should be used whenever the user logs out from the app.

        See Also:
        login

      • getRequiredPermissions

        @NotNull
public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRequiredPermissions()

      • getMissingPermissions

        @NotNull
public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMissingPermissions(@NotNull
                                                                       android.content.Context context)

        Returns a list of the permissions required to use the Streem SDK that are not presently granted.

        Parameters:
        context - the Context to use when checking each required permission's grant status.

      • getSupportedCountries

        public void getSupportedCountries(@NotNull
                                  kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.SupportedCountriesResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)

        Returns a list of countries supported by the Streem service. Typically this is used before calling createInvitation when submitting a phone param, which must include a country code. First call getSupportedCountries, then use the countries list to populate a form field for country code, and/or validate user-entered phone numbers before submitting them phone number to createInvitation.

        Parameters:
        resultCallback - a function that is called with a SupportedCountriesResult
        See Also:
        createInvitation, phone, getSupportedCountries, createInvitation

      • createInvitation

        public void createInvitation(@NotNull
                             java.lang.String toUserName,
                             @Nullable
                             java.lang.String referenceId,
                             @Nullable
                             java.lang.String phone,
                             @NotNull
                             Streem.InvitationType invitationType,
                             @NotNull
                             kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super pro.streem.sdk.Streem.CreateInvitationResult,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)

        Creates an invitation to streem, and returns invitation information for display to the user.

        Parameters:
        toUserName - the full name of the user that is being invited to streem.
        referenceId - a referenceId for the invitation (optional).
        phone - the user's phone number (optional). phone must start with a country code(+1 in the US, for instance). If a phone number is provided, the invitation is sent to thephone number via SMS. If no phone number is provided, the invitation code and url availableto the resultCallback function parameter in class Streem.StreemInvitation must be delivered to theuser via other means.
        invitationType - the delivery mechanism for the invitation. If InvitationType.PHONE,then phone must be provided.
        resultCallback - a function that is called with the class Streem.CreateInvitationResult.

 @NotNull
public static Streem get()

        Returns the shared class Streem instance. Streem.initialize MUST have been called before calling this method.
